synopsis.text: The talented creators at Blessing Software continue their journey developing a highly-anticipated romance video game. In search of inspiration for an in-game swimsuit scene illustration, the team visits a luxury hotel pool with a picturesque view. Character artist Eriri requests that heroine model Megumi pose in swimwear to properly depict the game heroine. Initially hesitant, Megumi agrees under the condition that the entire team participates. What follows is a lighthearted outing allowing Eriri to gather visual references while the others enjoy friendly banter and summer fun. Scene writer Utaha and programmer Michiru embrace the leisure, contrasting with Megumi's reserved manner. Throughout the amusing research trip, dedicated producer Tomoya ensures smooth progress on game development milestones.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
